name: King of the Wings
bio:
International award winning Food truck. Australia's first American style chicken wing food truck!! 
Offering 5 unique flavours of succulent, flavoursome, crispy wings!! Taste the hype!
Represented Australia in New York in 2016 for the Worlds Biggest Buffalo Wing Festival, current holder of Best Food Truck Brisbane (Eat Drink Awards 2018)... 
This truck is a must try for wing lovers!!

name: Rolling Stone Pizza
bio:
The heat of our authentic wood-fired oven is matched only by our passion for great pizza. 
From the excitement of a local market in the city to the intimacy of a wedding reception on the coast, we take great
pride in raising the bar on the mobile dining experience.
We hold a 5 Star Eat Safe Rating with Brisbane City Council and use fresh, seasonal produce, sourced wherever possible from local producers across SE QLD.
Our menu offers Gluten Free and Vegetarian options, along with traditional favourites and gourmet specials.
"Rolling In" to a location near you soon!

name: Cone Queen
bio: For over a decade, the Cone Queen has been tantalising the people of South-East Queensland with her delicious, high quality soft serve ice creams. When whipping out the ice creams from the eccentrically decorated window of her classic Bedford ice cream truck – ‘Betty’ – the Cone Queen says every ice cream is like “handing out a handful of happiness to a new friend!”

name: London Spuds
bio:
London Spuds is a family owned Foodie adventure!

We specialise in creating the most delicious Fresh, Hot Baked Potatoes! Our spuds are cooked to perfection in our Traditional English Potato Ovens - then filled to the brim with only the best quality meats and freshest ingredients. 

Our amazing meals are completely gluten free, and are the perfect comfort food. All food is prepared & cooked in a Brisbane City Council approved 5 star mobile food truck kitchen.

Our customers LOVE them and our talented team LOVE to give you great food at a stellar price. Guaranteed to make you Happy! We can't wait to have you try our fabulous SPUDS!

name: Flavours of Eataly
bio:
It all began in 2014 with one woman and a dream.
-
My name is Daniela, a qualified chef and pastry! I arrived in Australia in 2002 with my son Nicholas and I started to work in a very well know Italian restaurant in Adelaide SA. In 2003 I won the bronze medal at the International Culinary Extravaganza in Perth. Food has been always a big part of my life and my culture....Many of my recipes are from tradition (from grandmother to mother and to me). In 2014 after my divorce (LOL), I thought to open a mobile food business and started to looking around for that! after 3 years of exhausting up and downs finally, on the 19th of August 2017 Flavours of Eataly was born!!!! 
We are proud to cook everything from scratch and we spend so much time in make things perfect, starting from our own home made spicy sausages to our mouth watering tiramisu! You can find us in markets festivals and big events! but also you can book us for your private function or a different birthday party anywhere you like, at home or in a park, we can make a quote for you, and we do the rest!
Please for any information contact our Operations and Training Manager

name: The Wiener Wagon
bio:
The Wiener Wagon is a fun, brightly coloured, custom built retro style food van, one of the latest and greatest food vans to hit Brisbane's burgeoning food truck scene.             

The Wiener Wagon is not just another German sausage van – yes we do sell some German sausages, but we also sell gourmet, award winning, hand made sausages produced by local butchers, served on a freshly baked roll, and topped with condiments to enhance the sausage flavour.  In addition to our wiener creations, we also sell our hugely popular loaded fries (double bacon & cheese with chipotle mayo or pulled pork with WW special sauce and apple slaw).  Our beer battered fries with aioli are a true winner, as are our sweet potato fries served with sour cream and chives.  And you can't go past an old fashioned milkshake to wash it all down!             

Available for private hire.  We can tailor our menu to suit your crowd.          

"Good times abound when The Wiener Wagon is around!!"

name: Softy and Frosty
bio:
Softy & Frosty's sweet little vintage ice cream truck brings to life childhood memories of the ice cream van rolling through the streets. The sound of Greensleeves echoing up and down the hills of Brisbane, getting closer and closer sent households into a frenzy! Everyone madly racing to find spare change and out the door to wait impatiently for a glimpse of the ice cream van and the delicious creamy soft swirls of ice cream. 
Based in Brisbane's Bayside, Softy &  Frosty made memories then and are making memories now to share with family and friends in the streets of Brisbane.

name: Bill’s Burgers Bus
bio:
Bill’s Burgers brings to the streets of Brisbane succulent gourmet burgers made from only the finest quality ingredients, served to you from Australia's only double decker burger bus!  Proudly boasting a 5 star BCC Eatsafe rating, we guarantee you nothing but deliciousness out of our newly converted mobile kitchen, complete with upstairs dining for up to 30 people and an awesome sound system to get your party rocking!  Let us cater for your next private function - corporate, weddings, birthdays, schools etc.

Contact us for your next event: 0432 080 727 info@billsburgers.com.au

name: Rolling Stone Pizza Truck 2
bio: The heat of our authentic wood-fired oven is matched only by our passion for great pizza. From the excitement of a local market in the city to the intimacy of a wedding reception on the coast, we take great pride in raising the bar on the mobile dining experience. We hold a 5 Star Eat Safe Rating with Brisbane City Council and use fresh, seasonal produce, sourced wherever possible from local producers across SE QLD. Our menu offers Gluten Free and Vegetarian options, along with traditional favourites and gourmet specials. "Rolling In" to a location near you soon!

name: BrisVegans
bio:
"Where words fail, food speaks"  
Brisvegans cater for weddings, functions, birthday parties , corporate parties and much more. Jump onto our facebook page and send through an enquiry!

name: That Food Van
bio: When my eldest daughter was diagnosed with Coeliac Disease, my wife and I realise just how big the gap in the market was for 100% gluten free dining options. As a chef of 20 years, I have been involved with a wide range of special dietary needs throughout my career and we decided to fill that gap. That Food Van is the culmination of that decision. My entire menu is 100% gluten free and completely Coeliac friendly. As I tell many of my customers " There isn't even a 'May Contain' statement in my trailer." That Food Van has been operating in the Greater Brisbane area since December 2018. We are available for markets, private and corporate events, school fetes and much more. Feel free to get in touch via email, phone, SMS or Facebook Messenger.

name: Walkway to Ceylon
bio:
Craving for  authentic  spicy but not  hot cuisines!!!!! 
Then, spice-up your meal with mouth watering Sri Lankan street food. 
"Ceylon food" is all about love. We are committed with the quality of our creations and we make it healthier as well as tastier.

name: The Soft Spot Ice cream
bio:
MADE YOU LICK! 

We’ve been creating the perfect twirl that’ll make your inner child scream for ice cream. 

The secret lies in premium soft-serve ice cream freshly made for you using our Italian ice cream machine and a lot of love!
Each and every twirl is perfectly handmade with the best ingredients that coin can buy and we’re proudly gluten-free and vegetarian-friendly!   
Just one lick and you’ll be coming back for more!

WANNA PARTY LIKE IT’S SHERBET-DAY? 
Chill out and let the soft spot cater for all your ice cream needs. The soft spot van is available for hire for an assortment of functions including corporate events, promotional launches, school events, and private celebrations such as weddings and birthdays. With the soft spot at your next event, your party will be sweeter than anything you ever creamed…Uh, we mean dreamed of. 

Contact us to find out how we can cater for your next event!

name: Micasa Burger Truck
bio: Micasa Burger Truck is one of the pioneer gourmet food trucks in Brisbane. The owner and chef has been operating gourmet food trucks since 1997 and is highly experienced when working with large corporates and high volume location catering. Hand made old school American burgers the way they should be!

name: CHEF 365
bio:
CHEF 365 is a catering service team providing Contemperary Fusion Cuisine to the Community, individually created menu and recipes based on clients Dietary requirements & Cultural Consideration for any kind of event, functions and celebrations.
Our Executive Owner Chef Paddy Zhang was an Iron-Chef in China Centre Television Show and Asian Cuisine Specialty for Several World-class Restaurants & Hotels.

name: My Latino Fusion
bio:
It is our passion to bring in a fusion of unique food culture from South America. My Latino Fusion is owned and operated by a professional chef from PERU. With extensive food experience back from South America to Australia. After working for  more than 10 years as a professional chef, we are ready to bring the unique flavours South American Gourmet  Food to our Australia FOODIES! 

Our food is freshly prepared and healthy, using local ingredient and supporting our local grovers. We have a selection of options for everyone, Vegetarian/Vegan/Gluten Free/Dairy Free.

We offer private catering with a selection of menu for each special occasion, from our casual Food Truck menu to  Fine Dining / Private chef.

name: Socal Tacos
bio: Authentic Southern Californian tacos, nachos, street snacks and burrito bowls. Pop up restaurant at Wellers Hill Bowls Club Tarragindi and a retro food truck available for Event hire, Festivals & Special Events across Brisbane & South East Queensland!

name: Chill Juice Bar
bio:
We sell fresh cold pressed juices and smoothies all made to order from our retro caravan. 
Our juices contain only fresh fruits and vegetables - nothing else. Our variety of smoothies are made from fresh fruit and vegetables, seeds, nuts, nut butters, dried fruit, and optional dairy or dairy free products.

name: Smash Burger Society
bio:
The Best of Authentic Smash Burgers on Wheels.
Gourmet Loaded Fries, Amazing Burgers and speedy service make for a very sought after Food Truck

name: Kreamed Ice Cream and Gelato
bio: Planning a day out at South Bank Parklands? Top it off with Brissie's best gelato (a.k.a fancy pants ice cream) right on the water at Riverside Green. And if you're keen on taking it to the next level ;) we have some OTT toppings that make our gelato even more epic! And if gelato isn't your thang, that's cool, we've got some seriously awesome coffee from our buddies at Fonzie Abbott. Check us out 7 days a week... pop Kreamed into Google Maps for location deets  #igotkreamed

name: Chef Jon Gourmet Food Truck
bio: We offer hand rolled gourmet Neapolitan style wood fired pizzas from our food truck.  We also do private catering with selection of menu options from buffet style to fine dining.

name: Good Time Diner
bio:
Good Time Diner offers a food trailer that looks awesome!

With a menu of classic burgers from The Big Bopper or Honolulu Halloumi (Vegetarian) to our Hot Diggety Dagwood Dogs we have something for everyone!

Complete your meal with our special seasoned fries!

The Good Time Diner is sure to bring some life to your event with good food, good times and good beats!

Please visit our Social Media pages for more information or contact us on 0404 366 485.

name: Tasty East
bio:
A fusion of modern and traditional Asian flavours. 
Recreating our family's signature dishes and other favourite eastern cuisines, we are serving up Nasigoreng Malaysian fried rice, BBQ pork buns, Roasted pork belly BAO bun, popcorn chicken with fries, and a variety of entrees like satay chicken skewers, grilled pork meatballs, and spring rolls. 
Catering to all your requirements. Available for weddings, birthday's, and private events. Follow our page @Tasty East 2021 to stay updated with our upcoming events!!!

name: Istanbul On Wheels
bio:
Baking Turkish Pide and doing Gozleme in Brisbane since 2008.

Experience the ultimate Turkish gastronomy with Istanbul on Wheels.
We created our own original unique recipes, offering Turkish most loved and popular dishes,
Pide, Gozleme, Lahmacun /lahma-june/ (original Turkish Pizza), Iskender Kebab, Turkish homemade dips, Baklava and more!

We had our first 'Turkish Bakery' stall at Powerhouse market, Redcliffe market, and Queen St Mall market in 2008. Turkish Bakery had been trading at Brisbane's markets and events since then. In 2021, we upgraded to food truck and brand named our food truck Istanbul on Wheels (by Turkish Bakery).

name: Joy Turkish Street Food
bio: Joy Turkish Street Food is a vibrant and inviting food truck bringing the authentic tastes of Turkey to our community. We specialize in serving authentic Turkish gözleme, a traditional flatbread stuffed with various delicious fillings and cooked to perfection. Alongside our signature gözleme, we offer a delightful snack pack, sweet and fragrant Turkish delight, and a selection of refreshing soft drinks. Our goal is to provide a joyful and satisfying dining experience that reflects the rich culinary heritage of Turkey. Join us and taste the joy of authentic Turkish street food!

name: Best of the Wurst
bio:
We specialise in fresh, delicious gourmet cuisine inspired by German and Australian flavours, available at various locations across the city. Our menu proudly features gluten-free sausages, and we also offer a flavourful vegan option to cater to everyone.

Be sure to indulge in our signature dishes, including the juicy and tender pork knuckle, aromatic Currywurst, savoury meatball with gravy roll, and warm, freshly baked large pretzels.

Planning an event? Whether it’s a wedding, corporate lunch, private function, school event, market, or family gathering, our Food Truck and Food Trailer are ready to bring the ultimate culinary experience to you. Let us provide mouthwatering options that your guests will love!

name: Food Baby Food Truck
bio:
Food Baby is a Brisbane-based food truck, serving up delicious food from a unique, vintage American Chevy Step Van. The way street food was meant to be!

Specialising in amazingly tasty burgers, Food Baby Food Truck is chef-owned and operated. 

Contact us to discuss your needs or ideas for a private booking at events, workplace lunches, special occasions, birthdays and weddings.

It's street food, baby!

name: GRASSFED
bio:
Gourmet Plant Based Burgers and Loaded fries 
- Gluten Free options
- Halal
- Kosher

Available for Markets, events, festivals, private bookings, weddings ect

We can customise a menu for your function not just limited to burgers, we can work in a whole array of plant based meals.

name: Wonderland Food Truck
bio: Whimsical Wonderland Food Truck: Transforming South East QLD events with magical flavors

name: Brissy Turkish Tucker
bio:
Craving authentic Turkish flavors? Look no further!

Since our humble beginning in 2021, we bring you freshly baked Pide (Turkish pizza) and Gozleme cooked right on-site, using only the freshest ingredients. Our dishes are handcrafted with care, offering a taste of tradition in every bite.

And don't forget to treat yourself to our homemade Baklava and Turkish Delight, the perfect sweet ending to your meal. Whether you're a first-timer or a long-time fan, we promise an unforgettable culinary experience. Come visit us and taste the difference freshness makes!

name: Coastal Swirls
bio:
Kia Ora! 

Coastal Swirls serves “made to order” NZ styled ice creams. They are a classic and popular kiwi treat, and with good reason!! 

We use vanilla ice cream or our vegan coconut ice cream as the base, which we then add and blend your chosen fruit through our fancy machine to create the most creamy and refreshing swirls. 

Once you try one you will be in heaven and already craving your next cup or cone! 

Our flavours- Banana, Mango, Strawberry and Mixed Berry with a few select toppings.

name: Tailgaters USA
bio: An American food truck bringing you awesome cookout and party foods. Book us for an event now!

name: Koma Sliders
bio: "It's Korean.  It's American. It's Slider-licious!"  True to our moniker, Koma Sliders is food truck that stands out by fusing two different cuisines and serving up something different and delicious.   From our cook-to-order fully loaded fries that come topped off with mozzarella cheese, Bulgogi beef, caramelised kimchi, and aioli + spicy mayo.  To the meats that are prepared in our original, made-from-scratch marinades.  To our style of cooking, juicy Korean BBQ meats cooked right in front of your eyes for our sliders.   Everything has a Korean inspiration behind it.

name: Catch and Kiss Seafood
bio:
Catch and Kiss started in Brisbane and in a short time built a strong following based on great food and friendly customer service. In time they have expanded to be able to offer a range of fresh seafood focused dishes to customers from their vintage Citroen H Van "Claudette" who is truly as beautiful as she is unique. Claudette's crew are renowned for having a variety of delicious seafood, such as  fresh oysters, Australian fish,  tender calamari and Australian prawns all served with  "the best chips in the universe" and seasonal salad etc. Is your mouth watering yet?

Claudette is also available for private and corporate catering, weddings, parties and all other events and festivals with an adaptable menu.

name: The Bun Mobile
Mr America Food Truck
bio:
Mr America Hotdogs and Fries is one of a kind American themed food truck / trailer, our business is based around the american love of food trucks!

Our American hotdogs are the best this side of LA, so good the Americans hunt us down! We steam our buns and we steam our FRANKS!

	•	Authentic American hotdogs - the traditional hotdog through to the North Carolina BBQ Dog and Hound Dog!
	•	Fries and LOADED fries - Hot american french fries through to Mississippi Cajun Fries & Louisiana BBQ bacon fries!
	•	Burgers - The humble traditional hamburger through to the Dirty Texan burger!

Contact us: events@mramerica.com.au

name: One World Food Truck
bio: One World Food Truck is the creation of chef Jason Sierra. With a Spanish background he focuses on Spanish/Latin food however don’t be surprised if One World lives up to its name by serving up wonderful Italian fare or suprises you with other quirky creations, it’s a food truck with an open mind that’s fuelled by flavour and driven by passion. Some examples from our menu are the "El Toro Loco Burger", a "Cubano" sandwich, “One World Steak and Cheese Piadina”, “Pinchitos”, “Spicy wings” all served on homemade flat breads and brioche buns as vehicles for our yummy dishes.

name: Farmer Brown's Pizzas
bio: Farmer Brown's Pizzas. We are a fully licensed mobile Wood-fired pizza set up. All the ingredients are fresh, sourced locally and our pizzas are made with love. Our staff are all mates mixed with family and we love what we do. We like to create a fun, relaxed atmosphere and can cater all over Greater Brisbane. We cater for weddings, functions, birthday parties , corporate parties and much more. Just jump on our website and send through an enquiry :) https://fbpizzas.com.au/mobile-catering-brisbane/

name: Notorious E.A.T
bio:
Brisbanes Best Burger foodtruck AND the kings of catering! Book us for your next event, wedding, corporate lunch or party. 

We operate a foodtruck and a two trailers so we can cover more events. Run by 2 chefs, Jem and Dan, our menu is based on American diner style food. Burgers, wings, loaded fries, loaded onion rings and more! Come find us - we post locations every Monday on Socials.

name: Ma Petite Cuisine
bio: Authentic french Cuisine  all made from scratch with the best quality and fresh produce the world have to offer ! We are every Friday night at Boundary street markets in west end !

name: New York Waffles
bio:
Belgian Eats from New York Streets! 
We make traditional Belgian waffles loaded with Brisbane's best ice cream and decadent New York inspired toppings. We also offer a range of savoury options like pulled-pork loaded waffle fries and Southern-style fried chicken and waffles. Our eye-popping food trailer with custom graphics and Broadway-style signage is perfect for your next event.

name: Bill’s Burgers
bio: Bill’s Burgers brings to the streets of Brisbane succulent gourmet burgers made from only the finest quality ingredients, served to you from our funked up food truck. Proudly boasting a 5 star BCC Eatsafe rating, we guarantee you nothing but deliciousness out of our newly built mobile kitchen!  Let us cater for your next private function.

name: The Wood Fired Oven
bio: At The Wood Fired Oven, we hand make and cook gourmet wood-fired pizza, calzones, dessert pizza and so much more.  With an onboard smoker oven, we also slow cook smoked pork and beef ribs, bbq platters, smoked macaroni and cheese, and many of the ingredients that we use on our pizza's.  All our dough is hand made using the finest Italian Caputo 00 flour, we make our own sauces by hand, hand roll our dough, and create a traditional style of pizza, whilst imbuing the Aussie twist-our pizza dough is a little thicker than traditional Neopolitan pizza.  So whether your looking for a great lunch, dinner or have an event your running we can provide "More than just pizza!"

name: Eat The Thing
bio: Eat the Thing food truck prides itself on its diversity of menu which includes a range of international flavours served in Tacos, Bowls or loaded fries

name: ALBA Catering Japanese
bio:
In November  2017,  ALBA Catering launched. 
Our mission, purpose and destiny is our gift to the people, with handmade goodness traditional style of cooking Japanese dishes .
We love serving quality meal for everyone !! We go above and beyond to ensure any special catering & events has lasting experience creating a zen vibe, happy taste buds.
We look forward to serve and sharing our lifetime of experience.

name: Pequeña Cocina
bio:
Pequeña Cocina (Little Kitchen) serves authentic Latin American street food from the back of a classic 1975 Chevrolet C30 pick up truck.
We are passionate about showcasing authentic Latin American street food with an ever changing menu. Our family run business is headed by chef Dave Watts who has over  20 years experience cooking around the world from street food to fine dining.
Our menus are created using the freshest local ingredients available alongside specialty imported items designed to make the dishes truly authentic.
Pequeña Cocina is available for both private and corporate events including weddings, birthdays, parties and pop up’s. Breakfast, lunch or dinner talk to us about your event and like Pequeña Cocina itself we can custom build your menu, our Chevy brings a classic fun angle to any Fiesta. Keep an ojo on our Website to see where we are parking up each week and swing by to say Hola!

name: Brat Haus
bio: We at Brat Haus are proud to be known in and around Brisbane for selling Australia's biggest and best authentic German Sausages, served on a roll, with a choice of sauerkraut and an array of delicious sauces.  Our sausages are gluten free, contain no artificial preservatives. The original " Bratmobile" has been on the road since July 2016, and has been cruising around from Canberra to Rockhampton & everywhere in between. Have a Function? Party? Festival? or Market? coming up. Send us an email or give us a call.

name: Dogstop360
bio:
The team at Dogstop360 have been trading since 2019. We are always looking to create new and exciting versions of hotdogs as well as still providing the classics.
We  get food out fast and we get it out hot, tasty and fresh to you! Our 7 metre Australian built custom food truck was built precisely for this!
Our fries and  loaded fries are top of the range and always get rave reviews. Hotdogs are our thing, however we can cater to any kind of event or function, if hotdogs aren't your choice for the day, we are very flexible and can discuss other menu choices. We use top of the range smoked and grilled franks and we hot steam our amazing artisanal bread. A hotdog isn't a hotdog if the breads dead Fred !!
We also have fully GF options as well as vegetarian options. 
5 STAR EAT SAFE RATING LOGAN CITY COUNCIL

name: Dinky D's Donuts
bio:
Dinky D's Donuts can cater any event with Donuts, Milkshakes and Merlo Coffee!

We cook on site mouth watering donuts served up as Cinnamon Donuts or tasty drizzle options of Nutella, Caramel, Strawberry, Crushed Oreo Cookies or Maple Syrup and Icing Sugar. To take your taste buds into orbit add cream or ice cream, delicious!

With 16 milkshake flavours and the free option to mix n match to create your own concoction you will love our Flavour Loaded shake shack shakes!

Dinky D's have a fabulous relationship with another QLD based operator in Merlo Coffee and with our fully trained Barista's we will cater for all coffee lover tastes....

Please contact Dinky D's for any event including Festivals, Fete's & Fairs, Corporate, Private Functions and Events and have our Dinky food trailer or food truck attend.

name: La Parrilla
bio: La Parrilla is a traditional Colombian and South American food trailer travelling around Brisbane and Ipswich to serve up delicious slow cooked meats cooked over charcoal . We provide catering for weddings birthday parties and corporate events.

name: Sushi to the Max
bio: Sushi To The Max is a rolling sushi roll dispensary that brings some moreish Japanese morsels to foodie events across the city. Those tempted by tempura, love noshing on nigiri, or salivate at the thought of salmon can satiate themselves any time Sushi To The Max rolls by. In addition to the sushi rolls, Sushi To The Max also dishes up other Japanese-inspired bites such as dim sims, seaweed salad, miso soup, as well as teriyaki and karaage bowls with crunchy salads. Follow Sushi To The Max on Facebook and Instagram to find out the latest updates on the food truck’s locations and dates.

name: Ceylonlia Foods
bio:
We are Ceylon Lia, and we have been cooking and serving mouth-wateringly tasty Sri Lankan cuisine right at our customers’ doorsteps! We have based ourselves in Brisbane, Austria. If our customers are anywhere close to where we are, then we promise that we have got them covered! 

We believe that our constant dedication towards our traditions and our enthusiasm for following them is what makes us unique, and brings our food to taste like the delicacies one may find in Sri Lanka! We want our customers to experience the diverse flavours of authentic Sri Lankan cuisine while sitting comfortably inside their houses! We are bringing forth a healthy and delicious mix of traditional Sri Lankan spices. We have even divided our food into several appealing categories sell traditional Sri Lankan Curry along with various combinations of curry and rice at an affordable price!
Come in touch with us and experience the fragrance, the taste, and the blissfulness of the traditional Sri Lankan recipes. Customers can dial in our number and order anything that will please them to their heart's content, and we promise to deliver a meal that you will absolutely love and cherish. So much so that you would want to order it again!

name: Rolls Pho Mi Food Truck
bio: Rolls Pho Mi first hit the roads in March 2016, delivering Vietnamese street food to the people of Brisbane, Gold Coast and Sunshine Coast from their fiery red food trailer. Recreating traditional recipes acquired from mum Dung, husband and wife team Duy and Steph are serving up classics like fresh rice paper rolls, their signature 24hr pho, authentic banh mi and mouthwatering snacks. There are refreshments on offer too; slow dripped Vietnamese iced coffee, fresh young coconut juice topped with fresh fruit and lychee lemonade. The business is family owned and operated which means every dish is made just like mum's using fresh, hand-picked quality ingredients.

name: Embraise Food
bio: We are a mobile food business who serves braised food from Taiwanese street and night market. We are currently serving for Brisbane Gourmet Truck initiative, private functions, and streets around Brisbane Southside. Please follow us on our fan page “Embraise Food” on Facebook for more details of what we are doing next.

name: London Spuds 2
bio:
London Spuds is a family owned Foodie adventure!

We specialise in creating the most delicious Fresh, Hot Baked Potatoes! Our spuds are cooked to perfection in our Traditional English Potato Ovens - then filled to the brim with only the best quality meats and freshest ingredients.

name: El Corazon Mexican
bio:
We're El Corazon - the new pink food truck set to bring the tastiest Mexican food to the streets of Brisbane and beyond.

Serving up street tacos, nachos and loaded nacho fries and using free range meats together with fresh locally sourced ingredients makes for tantalisingly fragrant, zesty food offerings.
 
Our succulent meats are wood smoked - slow cooked in authentic Mexican chipotle and adobo spices. Free range pulled pork, beef brisket or shredded chicken, served with slaw, paired with freshly made salsas and various condiments. Organically grown jackfruit with a smokey BBQ flavour is used as our vegan option, which resembles a delicious meat-like consistency when cooked.
 
And of course no taco truck would be complete without offering the much coveted fish taco. Locally caught white fish battered and fried, served on slaw, dressed with salsa verde & chipotle mayo and served with a wedge of lime. Delicioso!
 
All tacos are served on your choice of soft shell flour or corn (GF) tacos and garnished with cilantro.
 
Our nachos are loaded with your choice of protein, melted cheese, black beans, salsa roja, pico de gallo and guacamole with optional sour cream and jalapenos.
 
Or, try our loaded nacho fries, exactly the same as our nachos but atop our golden shoestring fries instead.
 
We can also offer burritos (including breakfast burritos), and an array of hot starters. 

Let us tailor a menu to suit your fiesta!

name: treats and CO
bio: treats & CO bring our treats anywhere that treats lovers gather - we are treats on wheels! Decadent gourmet cookies and brownies (including low- gluten and vegan) for parties and events!

name: Samurai Kitchen
bio:
We serve Japanese style fried chicken. Also known as Karaage. 
Everything on our menu has our delicious Karaage in it. 
We’ve utilised the Karaage in so many ways there should be something on the menu for you. 
We have also added wagyu burgers to our menu. 
We don’t have anything vegetarian but we are working on it so we can provide our food to everyone. We’re driven to provide fast and delicious food and are available to provide our services for catering, private functions or corporate events. 
For more information please don’t hesitate to contact us via email or phone. 
samuraikitchen2020@gmail.com
0409898281 - 0490885765

name: Eat Fresh Kebabs
bio:
Eat Fresh Kebabs have been serving the Gold Coast and Brisbane areas since 2006. Made fresh to order with bursting flavours, our fresh produce and the TLC that goes into making every meal is guaranteed to meet your needs and stimulate your taste buds to the max. Gluten free, vegan and vegetarian options are available.


We are proud to be family owned and operated. 

Book us for your next event ---  weddings, corporate lunches, private functions, school events or parties. 
Contact us for a menu that suits your needs.

name: Miss P’s Ice Cream
bio:
Local Brisbane owned and operated. All things Ice-cream and we love serving our old school soft serve ice-creams , shakes and sundae's to families across South East Queensland. We both enjoy providing our services for - Wedding's, Kids Parties, Fete's, Disco’s, Formals, Sports Carnivals & Corporate Events. Our Ice-cream is Gluten Free - 100% Dairy. Please like and follow us on Facebook & Instagram and reach out to us, as we would love to help you with your event.

Please reach out to us, as we would love to help you with your event.

name: Aloha Twist – Dole WHIP
bio:
At last the FAMOUS "DOLE WHIP" direct from Disney World and Hawaii is here in Brisbane!!!!!!

Dole Whip is a better alternative for you and is Vegan, Gluten Free, Dairy Free, Lactose Free, No Cholesterol, Trans Fat Free, Low Saturated Fat and full of fruity flavour soft serve.
 
Check out our Facebook for more info.

name: Fricken Stop
bio: Korea style fried chicken with special sauces! Juicy inside and crispy outside!

name: Vamos Eats
bio: Vamos Eats is a family and chef owned and operated vibrant food truck excited to serve Brisbane and beyond! We boast Latin Flavours, Global Food and specialise in Latin inspired rice bowls and fiesta loaded fries. Vamos Eats can also tailor a menu for corporate and private catering, celebrations and all other events and festivals. Vamos!

name: Banhs on Wheels
bio: Bringing the vibrant flavours of Vietnam to you, our food truck offers fresh, made-to-order dishes inspired by traditional Vietnamese street food. Since the early '90s, our family has been perfecting the art of banh mi, featuring crispy pork belly on daily-baked family bakery bread. Alongside our signature banh mi, we serve fresh salad vermicelli bowls, rice paper rolls, and more. We take pride in using wholesome ingredients—never MSG, and all our ingredients are naturally made or farm sourced. We cater to all dietary needs, including gluten-free, vegan, and vegetarian options. We cater for all occasions, from corporate events and weddings to private parties like birthdays, anniversaries, or even a casual backyard BBQ. Not just banh mi—our menu offers plenty of options to suit your needs. Contact us to customise your order and book today to bring the authentic flavours of Vietnam to your next event!

name: Adarsh’s Food Van
bio: Indian street food mobile kitchen.

name: Smash and go.
bio: Smash burgers, chocolate strawberry cups, Real fruits ice-cream

name: Twisted Sister Events
bio:
This is a family owned and operated food truck and trailer. We have been trading for over 5 years specialising in Tornado Potatoes. We have a love for events and when you do what you love, you’ll never work a day in your life! 

Tornado Potatoes are what we are best at but our menu also offers a range of different things including but not limited to loaded chips, hot chips, dagwood dogs, sweet potato chips, dinosaur nuggets and kids packs. We can also do burgers and chips instead of Tornado Potatoes if that's what your after. Coming from a large family we know what it’s like to feed the family at events so we have made our menu with this in mind! 

We have had a fresh new wrap and she is bright and bubbly! 

Adults love us just as much as the kids!

Fluffy on the inside and crispy on the outside.

Contact us today!

name: That Chicken Chick
bio:
That Chicken Chick is an owner-operated food trailer with over ten years experience in the industry, specialising in all things chicken.....plus a little extra!

We have an assortment of menu options which include: Fried Chicken Burgers as well as Beef Burgers, Chicken Rice Bowls for a healthier option, Secret Honey Chicken, Dagwood Dogs, Hot Chips and of course Chicken Nuggets for the little ones. 

My team and I are known for delivering both high quality food and excellent customer service, we know the importance of reliability and flexibility when it comes to event planning and we work hard to ensure a smooth, enjoyable experience for you and your guests. 

We are fully insured and licensed with the City Council and my team is trained in food safety and is experienced in handling high volume crowds, whilst maintaining quality of all our menu options. We’ve had the pleasure of working in a variety of events from music festivals and corporate events to school functions and sporting competitions.

That Chicken Chick has been designed to be self sufficient, using a  7KVA generator for power as well as gas for cooking. We can also operate on supplied electricity using two 15 amp power outlets.

That Chicken Chick is available now to take bookings for your next festival, party, wedding, corporate catering event or private function all with an adaptaple menu of your choice.

All things chicken....plus a little extra!

name: The American Truck
bio:
A food truck dedicated to bringing the authentic taste of American burgers to the streets of Brisbane using only fresh ingredients. Our bright yellow food truck isn’t just a vehicle—it’s a moving kitchen operated by a chef.
You’ll find us at markets, festivals, private events, and special locations around the city

name: Villa Pot
bio: Villa Pot is your one stop spot for great and authentic Nigerian meals. We are keen on ensuring that your cravings are satisfied.

name: Ruby the Little Red Ice Cream Van
bio:
'Ruby' is a  fully restored, original vintage ice cream van built in England in 1973.  She arrived in Australia in 2013 where she underwent full restoration, hitting the streets of Brisbane and surrounds in 2014. Her menu features freshly made soft serve ice cream creations using a state of the art, high capacity, Italian Carpigiani ice cream machine.   Ruby's premium ice cream is milk based, gluten free and halal certified.  The traditional menu features crowd favourites such as the iconic 99 flake, rainbow sprinkles, sherbet, choc top, rocket, sundae as well as Ruby's signature specials.  Vegan and dairy free options are always available and alternative gelato and sorbet menus are available on request.  

Ruby's pastry chef qualified team has over 20 years gelato and ice cream making experience.  The van's unique set up  and experienced team specialise in high volume ice cream catering and the creation of impact ice creams for marketing activations. Please contact our team with your next event or activation enquiry.   Ruby has a Brisbane City Council Food Licence with a 5 star Eat Safe rating, Blue Cards and Public Liability Policy of $20 million.

Retrosweetness - Ruby's bringing it!

name: Sate House
bio:
We offer modern Malaysian cuisine and also with an infusion of local flavors to deliver a unique experience combining both the West and the East. We offer a diverse range of menu across international bordes and we are capable of doing more. For all your catering needs, whether it be an event, markets, festivals, private or corporate function, we are ready to serve! Do contact us to find out more about what we can offer. 

We strongly believe in delivering exceptional customer service while offering quality products to ensure that both our customers and organisers alike will have a good experience when dealing with us.

name: Rolls Pho Mi
bio: Rolls Pho Mi first hit the roads in March 2016, delivering Vietnamese street food to the people of Brisbane, Gold Coast and Sunshine Coast from their fiery red food trailer. Recreating traditional recipes acquired from mum Dung, husband and wife team Duy and Steph are serving up classics like fresh rice paper rolls, their signature 24hr pho, authentic banh mi and mouthwatering snacks. There are refreshments on offer too; slow dripped Vietnamese iced coffee, fresh young coconut juice topped with fresh fruit and lychee lemonade. The business is family owned and operated which means every dish is made just like mum's using fresh, hand-picked quality ingredients.

name: Juice Power
bio:
Here at Juice Power we are bringing freshly squeezed juices, smoothies, crushies, tea and coffee plus a range of healthy snacks such as fruit salads and salads in jars to a street near you.
We also offer the best Acai Bowls..all individually made to your tastes
A full range of coffee and teas are also offered.we use organic Montville coffee with a choice of milks
We offer drinks made to order. Our motto is "it's your drink" so tell us exactly how you like it.

See you soon!

name: CharKOR BBQ
bio: Our truck offers fusion Korean BBQ cooked in European charcoal oven.  Our menu offers mouth-watering, tasty marinated beef and Korean BBQ Chicken those are grilled and roasted in this special oven which only uses charcoal itself.  The oven is made of thick metal that keeps the temperature constant at 400 degrees.  This high temperature combined with charcoal flame keep the meat sealed and moist as well as give it a rich flavour.

name: Wild Rissole
bio: BURGER CATERING MADE EASY :  we specialize in making delicious, full flavored Burgers fast and fresh. Our beef signature Rissole burgers are juicy and full of flavour and our home made sauces are unique and delicious. we do festivals, markets and private catering, find us on facebook for locations. or check out our website for catering information.

name: Gelato à Go-Go
bio:
Welcome to Gelato à Go-Go - Queensland's original & best Gelato & Sorbet truck!. 
Onboard our gorgeously retro Citroen H van is premium Gelato & Sorbet made by our partner's at the multi award winning Maleny Food Co. 
Fresh Guernsey milk combined with the finest Italian ingredients and Queensland sourced fruit where possible to create the most amazing Gelato & Sorbet.  
We have over a 100 flavours to choose from and we aim to constantly change our menu to showcase the best selection of beautiful Gelato & Sorbet we can.

Gelato à Go-Go is available for all types of events, festivals, Fetes, charity functions, weddings or any other celebration you can think of. And If you're a business wanting to draw a crowd at corporate events and exhibitions, we can even have our van done in your own company's branding!. 
Please check out our website and social media and get in touch with us today!

name: The Tasty Pocket
bio:
Brisbanes original pita pocket slingers, serving up tasty Greek fusion pita pockets and Greek loaded fries. 

You can find us around Brisbanes foodtruck hot spots and serving up some of the best Greek feasts at corporate lunches.

We are still trading and would love to serve you via takeaway during this time.  Check out our insta or fb page for locations!

name: Yo Get It Queensland
bio:
Welcome to Yo Get It Queensland - the original and the best frozen yoghurt! You'll find our unique food trailer travelling around South East Queensland serving our delicious soft serve frozen yoghurt with your choice of tasty toppings. We offer flavours including French vanilla, strawberry, chocolate, salted caramel, coconut, peaches & cream, mango cheesecake, raspberry white chocolate etc. Our toppings range from decadent sweet treats including mini MnMs and crushed Tim Tams, right through to nourishing fresh fruits including fresh cut strawberries and blueberries. Can't choose just one flavour? Don't worry! You can mix n match all flavours and toppings for just $8 per serve.

 Visit us at our next event and try a free sample!

name: Tatty’s Superfoods
bio: Our passion is to deliver a healthy alternatives to locals by serving nutritious Acai Bowls and drinks. We always strive to use local produce to support our Queensland farmers. As a result, our seasonal menu is always changing to match fruits that are in season to make sure we are delivering the best and freshest product possible.

name: QLD Pizza Bros
bio: This mobile pizzeria is the first in Australia to be fitted with 2 restaurant size authentic wood fired pizza ovens. Our pizza chefs have a combined 15 years experience making traditional Italian pizzas and various other styles. Each pizza base is hand made and stretched fresh to order ( strictly No pre baked pizza bases ). The base of the pizza being made fresh, topped with only the best ingredients and cooked at 400 degrees ensures its quality and authenticity.

name: Greek Street Kantina
bio:
Greek Street Kantina is a hugely successful food truck, with our core business being community events and concerts.. 
We serve Traditional Greek Yiros, with a choice of Lamb,  Chicken, Grilled Haloumi, and Falafel wraps. Our Greek Street Kantina Platter is a favourite which friends and families love to share. 

Our food is all made fresh to order.
Vegetarian Optuons - Haloumi and Falafel
Gluten Free  Options - Bread and Chips

name: Jaycone
bio:
A brand new Australian first ice cream concept, A long golden gluten-free puffed corn cone injected with a selection of premium vegan ice creams! 

We also do thick shakes protein shakes and mad shakes!

name: Sons of Napoli
bio:
Sons of Napoli (SONS) brings to you a truly unique catering experience. Serving authentic Italian style woodfired pizzas from our fully restored vintage 1947 Dodge Fargo farm truck, we guarantee you an event that is memorable, hassle free and delicious! 

Weddings, parties and corporate gatherings are our specialty.  We offer a range of catering options to suit all types of celebrations while working within your budget, tastes and dietary requirements.  Along with our range of handmade Italian style woodfired pizzas, we also offer grazing tables, hot canapes, pasta and dessert options.

If you want your event to be casual yet elegant, get in touch with the SONS team!

name: Bodhi Tree Juices and Eats
bio:
In the kitchen of Bodhi Tree we proudly cook everything from scratch, starting from our home made hummus to our naturally fermented kombucha.
We prepare delicious plant based and vegetarian recipes served with cold pressed juices made with organically grown and locally sourced ingredients.
Our menus are ever changing because we grow our veggies in our natural farming , low carbon footprint , permaculture farm Echoes in the Valley!

The Bodhi tree is also known as the tree of awakening, where the Buddha found enlightenment. We make everything with love and we promise to feed your body and your soul with nourishing, sustainable and freshly made wholefood.

You can find us at markets, festivals, private events or on the side of the road around Brisbane &  Locker Valley. 
Therefore follow our social media to discover where we are and what is growing in our farm.

Supporting your local farmers has never been so delicious and healthy!

name: Wicked Wafflez
bio:
We cook our waffles onsite with fresh wholesome ingredients in a range of delicious flavour combinations.  Come and try one of our nine speciality flavours including the famous Triple Chocolate or the infamous Mars Bar!   Or if you're really hungry try one of our waffle combos - hot fresh Belgium waffles with wicked fruit and ice-cream, cream and all the trimmings served from our designer retro van.
 Looking forward to seeing you soon.

name: Jimbo's Delights
bio:
Our mouth-watering selection of delights includes Gourmet Donuts , Flavour-loaded Shakes (made with Ice Cream), Freshly Brewed and Made to order Bubble Tea (Fruit Teas, Milk Teas, Fruit Sodas), Soft Serve Ice Cream, Slushies, and our new range of The gourmet Loaded Donut Sundaes! We proudly offer Gluten Free, Dairy Free, Nut Free, and Vegan options, we have something for everyone! 

We have a truck full of sensation waiting to be a part of your next event!

name: Oh Waffles
bio:
Welcome to Oh Waffles where our waffles are always made fresh upon ordered. 
We serve the best Scandinavian waffles, fluffy poffertjes and slurpy milkshakes. Most of the dietary requirements can be catered if requested.
Book us in for festivals, parties, caterings or events! 
Don't forget to check us out on Instagram or Facebook @ohwaffles.au :)

name: That Gelato Truck
bio:
Hey, there! 
We are That Gelato Truck, we’re all about scooping joy and serving up smiles! Our gelato is handcrafted with love, using only the finest, freshest ingredients sourced from local farmers . 

Our truck is unique by offering 13 flavours of Gelato and sorbet at all our events so whether you’re a fan of classic Italian flavours like pistachio and stracciatella or curious to try our creative twists like Biscoff or Lemon Cheesecake,  we’ve got something to delight every palate.

Catch us rolling through your neighborhood or book us to sweeten up your next event! Because life’s too short not to enjoy it one scoop at a time.

name: Roll It Ice Cream Co
bio:
We're Roll It Ice Cream Co. Brisbane's only rolled ice cream vendor. Our 'rolled ice cream' is different to regular ice cream and gelato. We use our -25c freezing teppanyaki pans to manually chop, mix, create and roll our ice cream right before your eyes, to create the freshest ice cream you've ever had, made from the ingredients you choose.  We have Dairy and Gluten-Free options available and only use sustainable packaging and practices. (Vegan catering available on request)

Custom Menu design and branding options are available for catering clients. Personalise your ice cream, your menu and our 1960's model Airstream for your brand activations, weddings and any other events.

Roll It Ice Cream Co. is experienced at creating fully customised and interactive marketing activation experiences for large interstate clients, to creating bespoke menu's for weddings and corporate events. We would love to cater your next event, big or small. 
Just send us an email at info@rolliticecreamco.com.au to have a chat or alternatively fill out a catering form on our website linked below.

name: BBQ Roadshow Low’n’Slow
bio:
The BBQ Roadshow Low'n'Slow food truck serves delicious, juicy smoked meats (12hr brisket, 9hr pulled pork, Cajun chicken, beef & pork ribs), cheeseburgers, wings, sausages, mac'n'cheese, the legendary MONSTER burger and even a veggie burger that can be made vegan on request. The best seller is the BBQ BOX for 2 or you can double the meat (+pork ribs) in our massive MEAT FEAST. 

Most menu items can be done without gluten or dairy on request. Just request staff for takeaway boxes if you prefer to pick up some food to go.

name: BUBBO Dessert Brisbane
bio: The first and best bubble waffle ice cream dessert food trailer in town, we are here ready to serve you our much-loved bubble waffle ice cream desserts loaded from freshly cut strawberries and bananas to crunchy wafer and fudge brownies.

name: Jarva Juice
bio:
Jarva Juice: Fresh, Healthy, Sustainable.

Indulge in nature's goodness with Jarva Juice! We specialize in crafting delicious cold-pressed juices, smoothies, indulgent Milkos, and potent Super Health Shots, all made from locally sourced, fresh, nutrient dense ingredients that are bursting with flavour.

But we're not just about taste. We're eco-warriors, too. Our off-the-grid operation runs on battery power, backed by solar panel technology. We tote our own water and waste and manage the waste responsibly.  Our cups, lids, and straws are made from biodegradable plant-based materials not oils. 

What's more, our compact van, neatly fitting into a single car space, brings the party to your event, market, or workplace. Spice up your day and reach out for our customizable Drink Packages Pricing.

Elevate your workplace by adding a touch of health and freshness. Contact us to include your workplace, office, or building site on our weekday routes for a regular dose of wellness. 
Find us regularly at The Jan Powers farmers Markets MANLY - every 1st and 3rd Saturday of the month (6am-12pm) and The Manly Creative Markets every Sunday (8am-2pm) down by the Manly Harbourside. 

Follow us on Facebook and Instagram @jarvajuice for locations, updates, and more.

At Jarva Juice, it's not just a drink – it's an experience. Get to the juice

name: Wild hunger
bio: I am a chef from Kiev, Ukraine with over 20 years’ experience, of which the last 10 was gained in all corners of Australia - from Sydney to Adelaide. I now want to bring you the taste of authentic Ukrainian cuisine, both the well-known classic dishes and the best of its regional cuisine. All food is made from fresh locally sourced ingredients by myself in advance and will be finished off to order.

name: Barraca Street Grill
bio:
Combining the traditions of old world Portugal with the fire and spice of Mozambique, barraca food truck always brings the fun and the flavour. 

Serving Piri Piri BBQ grilled chicken, 15 hour slow cooked beef brisket, fresh salads and carbs that will have you coming back for more, it’s a favourite amongst the food lovers of the South East. 

This fully outfitted food truck operation, now in business for more than eight years, offers variety and a level of professionalism rarely seen in mobile food.
 
Please contact us for more details on our private catering or regular street-side locations. 
www.barraca.com.au

name: Hawker Eats
bio: At Hawker Eats, we are passionate about bringing you our mouthwatering dishes that combines asian cuisine with the rest of the world, catering to a diversified grouop of audience. We are based in south east queensland region serving up asian fusion streeet food. Some of our popular dishes include the unique Naan Bread Tacos, Loaded fusion roti and Singapore Black Pepper Chicken Chop. Come and try us when you guys see us.

name: Kitchen on Fire
bio: Join us for a taste sensation at Kitchen on Fire! Our food truck serves up fresh and delicious meals with an ever-changing menu of daily specials. Keep an eye out for us on the streets and come experience the fire for yourself.  We put a gourmet twist on classic street food favorites for a unique, unforgettable dining experience.

name: Gourmeat Grill and BBQ
bio: Mediterranean style food, appetizers, dessert,  gourmet meat,  bbq & grill.

name: Mr Bob Ice Cream
bio:
Bob ice cream was founded in Melbourne in 2013 and settled in Brisbane in 2023. You can find it in most parks in Brisbane's south.

Bob's premium ice cream is milk based, gluten free and halal certified. The traditional menu features crowd favorites such as the flake, rainbow sprinkles, Oreo, choc top, sundae as well as Bob's signature specials Gelato for you!

We are approved 20 million in business insurance, COVID vaccine certificate, Working with children blue card, and I regularly participate in charity organizations and school activities,wedding, private party, markets, all kinds community events.

name: Go Taco
bio: We started Go Taco with the goal of bringing high quality, delicious food to the streets of Brisbane. Our passion for cooking and serving others is what drives us every day.

name: Souvlucky
bio:
Souvlucky is a small family owned food van business, cooking Greek street food, souvlaki wraps and skewers. Born in 2020 in Karratha WA  and then relocated in  Brisbane QLD late 2023.
 Yes, we are able for public events and private functions.
